quote: "Why has not anyone seen that fossils alone gave birth to a theory about the formation of the earth, that without them, no one would have ever dreamed that there were successive epochs in the formation of the globe."     ~ Georges Cuvier (French naturalist)
It's always about timing. If it's too soon, no-one understands. If it's too late, everyone's forgotten. ~Anna Wintour

If future generations are to remember us with gratitude rather than contempt, we must leave them something more than the miracles of technology. We must leave them a glimpse of the world as it was in the beginning, not just after we got through it.
category: ~Lyndon B. Johnson (36th president of the United States)

quote: Mathematics is a confusing subject, because sometimes you do it for fun, and other times you do it to not die. And when I'm doing it, sometimes I'm not sure which one it is.~Anindita
